means: <贬>支持分裂的（人），支持教会分裂的（人）

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE逆序_馆档网 ... somatic 肉体的 schismatic 分裂的 numismatic 钱币学的.
宗教分裂者(schismatic)是指任何引起宗教分裂的人,不论他是个应对此事负责的煽动者,或者只因信念或既成的事实而依附裂教者。 (二)先是新约采用了,再转译为教会.
来自蓝宝形近及意近词 - 精华III区-... ... schism 分裂 schismatic 分裂者n，分裂的a scintillate 闪烁v.

RelatedPhrase.word: a person who causes schism or belongs to a schismatic faction

list.abs: Na person who causes schism or belongs to a schismatic faction 分裂者; 分立教会者adj. 分裂的；派别的

RelatedPhrase.word: the incomparable hammer of the schismatics

list.key: the incomparable hammer of the schismatics
list.exp: 超群出众的分离者的槌子
list.abs: ...安立甘教会主教。主张安立甘教会神学思想上的中庸之道，反对罗马教会及清教徒↗Puritans，被称为「超群出众的分离者的槌子」(the incomparable hammer of the schismatics)。着有《以四个论证阐明英国教会的分裂》(Schism of the Church of Englan.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French scismatique, via ecclesiastical Latin from ecclesiastical Greek skhismatikos, from skhisma (see schism)

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to or involved in or characteristic of schism;
